abstract: Microsoft named Qi Lu to run its struggling Internet unit on Thursday, filling an important position that had been vacant since the departure of Kevin Johnson in July.
snippet: Microsoft named Qi Lu to run its struggling Internet unit on Thursday, filling an important position that had been vacant since the departure of Kevin Johnson in July.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Microsoft named Qi Lu, a former Yahoo executive, to run its struggling Internet unit on Thursday.

headline.main: Microsoft Names Ex-Yahoo Executive as Internet Unit Chief
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Names Ex-Yahoo Executive as Internet Unit Chief
